TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SiteMapDataSource extends System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl implements class System.ComponentModel.IListSource, class System.Web.UI.IDataSource
Public Class SiteMapDataSource Inherits HierarchicalDataSourceControl Implements IDataSource, IListSource
public ref class SiteMapDataSource : System::Web::UI::HierarchicalDataSourceControl, System::ComponentModel::IListSource, System::Web::UI::IDataSource

summary.span: 提供資料來源控制項，Web 伺服器控制項和其他控制項可以使用這個資料來源控制項來繫結程序至階層式網站地圖資料。

span.span: Provides a data source control that Web server controls and other controls can use to bind to hierarchical site map data.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [指定的開始節點Specifying the Starting Node](#specifying_the_starting_node) - [擷取網站導覽資料Retrieving Site Map Data](#retrieving_site_map_data) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制項是要儲存提供者站台對應，已針對您的站台的站台地圖資料的資料來源。The control is a data source to the site map data that is stored by the site map providers that are configured for your site. 可讓 Web 伺服器控制項不特別網站瀏覽控制項，例如， ，和控制項，將繫結至階層式網站地圖資料。The enables Web server controls that are not specifically site navigation controls, such as the , , and controls, to bind to hierarchical site map data. 您可以使用這些 Web 伺服器控制項內容的資料表以顯示網站導覽或主動瀏覽的網站。You can use these Web server controls to display a site map as a table of contents or to actively navigate a site. 或者，您可以使用控制項的設計特別為站台瀏覽控制項，因此不需要的執行個體控制項。Alternatively, you can use the control, which is designed specifically as a site navigation control and therefore does not need an instance of the control. ## 指定的開始節點Specifying the Starting Node 繫結至網站導覽資料並呈現其站台對應階層中指定的開始節點為基礎的檢視。The binds to site map data and presents its view based on a specified starting node in the site map hierarchy. 根據預設，它是階層的根節點，但它也可以在階層內任何節點。By default, it is the root node of the hierarchy but it can also be any node within the hierarchy. 開始節點由數個值屬性，如下所示：The starting node is identified by the values of several properties as follows: |開始節點Starting Node|屬性值Property Values| |-------------------|---------------------| |階層 （預設值） 的根節點。The root node of the hierarchy (the default setting).| 為 `false`。The is `false`.

未設定。The is not set.| |表示目前檢視的頁面節點。The node that represents the currently viewed page.| 為 `true`。The is `true`.

未設定。The is not set.| |階層的特定節點。A specific node of the hierarchy.| 為 `false`。The is `false`.

設定。The is set.| 如果屬性設定為 0 以外的值，它會影響開始節點與其站台資料階層架構對應所公開控制項。If the property is set to a value other than 0, it affects the starting node and with it the site map data hierarchy that is exposed by the control. 負數或正數的整數值識別層級向上或向下由站台對應階層從開始的節點數目和位移開始節點子樹狀結構的屬性公開資料來源控制項。The negative or positive integer value of the identifies the number of levels up or down the site map hierarchy from the starting node that is identified by the and properties to offset the starting node of the subtree that is exposed by data source control. 如果屬性設為負數 *-n*，由資料來源控制項的樹狀子目錄的開始節點是上階節點*n*上識別階層的層級開始節點。If the property is set to a negative number *-n*, the starting node of the subtree that is exposed by the data source control is the ancestor node *n* hierarchical levels above the identified starting node. 如果值*n*大於在階層樹狀結構的樹狀子目錄的起始節點的祖系層級數目是站台對應階層的根節點。If the value *n* is greater than the number of ancestor levels in the hierarchical tree, the starting node of the subtree is the root node of the site map hierarchy. 如果屬性設定為正數 +*n*，公開的樹狀子目錄的開始節點是子節點*n*下所識別的起始節點層級。If the property is set to a positive number +*n*, the starting node of the subtree that is exposed is a child node *n* levels below the identified starting node. 因為階層中可能存在多個分支的子節點嘗試解析直接在識別的開始節點與代表目前要求的頁面上，如果可能的節點之間的路徑上的子節點。Because more than one branch of child nodes might exist in the hierarchy, the attempts to resolve a child node directly on the path between the identified starting node and the node that represents the currently requested page, if possible. 如果節點，表示目前要求的頁面不是識別開始節點的值的子樹中屬性會被忽略。If the node that represents the currently requested page is not in the subtree of the identified starting node, the value of the property is ignored. 表示目前要求的頁面節點是否小於*n*下識別開始節點目前要求的頁面節點層級做開始節點。If the node that represents the currently requested page is less than *n* levels below the identified starting node, the currently requested page node is used as the starting node. ## 擷取網站導覽資料Retrieving Site Map Data 站台地圖資料從擷取物件，例如，這是 ASP.NET 的預設站台對應提供者。Site map data is retrieved from an object, such as , which is the default site map provider for ASP.NET. 您可以指定任何已針對您的網站，以提供站台地圖資料的提供者，而且可以取得可用的提供者的清單，藉由存取集合。You can specify any provider that is configured for your site to provide the site map data to the and can obtain the list of available providers by accessing the collection. 所有資料來源控制項都，每個執行個體單一協助程式物件，稱為資料來源檢視相關聯。Like all data source controls, every instance of a is associated with a single helper object, known as a data source view. 根據資料來源的屬性，是在站台地圖資料上，檢視並呼叫擷取方法。The is a view on the site map data, according to the properties of the data source, and is retrieved by calling the method. 維護控制項繫結至的物件。The maintains the object that the controls bind to. 根據預設，開始的節點就是，在階層的根節點，但開始節點可以將任何節點。By default, the starting node is the root node of the hierarchy, but you can set the starting node to any node. 起始點可以是相對於目前的位置在站台對應，或絕對位置的節點。The starting point can be a node that is relative to the current position in the site map or to an absolute position. 您可以設定來指定開始節點屬性。You can specify the starting node by setting the property. 專門用於巡覽資料並不支援一般的資料來源作業，例如排序、 篩選、 分頁、 快取，或資料記錄的作業，例如更新、 插入或刪除。The is specialized for navigation data, and does not support common data source operations such as sorting, filtering, paging, caching, or data record operations such as updates, insertions or deletions. ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式將繫結控制項以使用站台對應控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively bind a control to a site map using a control. 站台地圖資料會擷取從根節點層級。The site map data is retrieved beginning at the root node level. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_1/CS/webform1smdscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_1/VB/webform1smdsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 擷取可以當做資料清單來源使用的資料來源控制項清單。

span.span: Retrieves a list of data source controls that can be used as sources of lists of data.

returns.span: 可以當做資料清單來源使用的資料來源控制項之 。

span.span: An of data source controls that can be used as sources of lists of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來擷取一組物件，可用來當作來源控制項。Use the method to retrieve a set of objects that can be used as sources for the control. 站台對應資料來源控制項封裝清單的資料做為物件。Site map data source controls encapsulate their lists of data as objects. 因此，與一或多個相關聯時物件，控制項代表清單的來源物件和方法會傳回包含一個元素的清單，資料來源控制項本身。Therefore, when associated with one or more objects, a control represents a list source object and the method returns a list containing one element — the data source control itself. 方法會呼叫靜態方法來擷取可用來當做資料來源的物件清單。The method calls the static method to retrieve a list of objects that can be used as sources of data. 會檢查是否方法會傳回有效的檢視名稱的集合。The checks whether the method returns a valid collection of view names. 若是如此，傳回包含一個元素的清單- 。If it does, the returns a list containing one element — the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `viewName`參數是檢視，而不是資料來源檢視的名稱的根節點的 URL，因為它是與其他資料來源控制項，以支援具名的檢視。The `viewName` parameter is the URL for the root node of the view, not the name of the data source view as it is with other data source controls that support named views.

The is but the is set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要用於資料來源控制項的站台對應提供者執行個體。Use the property to specify the site map provider instance to use with the data source control. 執行個體可以是不同的提供者，由屬性，如果設定。The instance can be different than the provider that is identified by the property, if set.

exception.span: 由 所命名的提供者無法使用。

\- or -

value.span: 所繫結的網站導覽提供者名稱。

span.span: The name of the site map provider that the binds to.

value.span: 根據預設，此值為 ，而且會使用站台的預設網站導覽提供者。

span.span: By default, the value is , and the default site map provider for the site is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式將繫結網站導覽資料所提供的控制項預設提供者以外的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively bind a control to site map data that is provided by an object other than the default provider. Web.config 檔案可讓自訂物件可用來`SiteMapDataSource`控制項：The Web.config file makes a custom object available to the `SiteMapDataSource` control: ``` ``` 程式碼`SimpleTextSiteMapProvider`類別，這個 Web.config 檔案的範例參考位於類別概觀。The code for the `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` class that this Web.config file example references can be found in the class overview. 如果您使用 Visual Basic 範例，命名空間會在"VB"，而不是"CS"結束。If you use the Visual Basic example, the namespace ends in "VB" instead of "CS". 您也可以尋找範例內容中的"text.txt 「 站台對應檔案類別概觀。You can also find sample content for the "text.txt" site map file in the class overview. > [!NOTE] > `AsciiTextProvider`不是預設的提供者站台 （在此情況下） 依然物件。The `AsciiTextProvider` is not the default provider for the site, which (in this case) remains the object. 屬性控制項設定為自訂網站地圖提供者的名稱和資料對應至對應的站台的繫結。The property of the control is set to the name of a custom site map provider, and the binds to the corresponding site map data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_3/CS/webform3smdscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_3/VB/webform3smdsvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the site map node tree is retrieved using the node that represents the current page.

value.span: 如果所擷取的節點樹相對於目前的頁面，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the node tree is retrieved relative to the current page; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫期間會評估屬性和方法，以協助您判斷哪一個站台對應節點，以用來作為起點指向建置節點樹狀結構。The property is evaluated during calls to the and the methods to help determine which site map node to use as a starting point to build the node tree. 和屬性互斥 — 如果您設定屬性，請確認屬性是`false`。The and properties are mutually exclusive — if you set the property, ensure that the property is `false`. 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int StartingNodeOffset { get; set; }
.property instance int32 StartingNodeOffset
Public Overridable Property StartingNodeOffset As Integer
public: virtual property int StartingNodeOffset { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定從開始節點位移的正整數或負整數，判斷資料來源控制項所公開的根階層架構。

span.span: Gets or sets a positive or negative integer offset from the starting node that determines the root hierarchy that is exposed by the data source control.

value.span: 預設值為 0，表示 所公開的根階層架構與開始節點相同。

span.span: The default is 0, which indicates that the root hierarchy exposed by the is the same as the starting node.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果屬性設定為 0 以外的值，它會影響開始節點與其站台資料階層架構對應所公開控制項。If the property is set to a value other than 0, it affects the starting node and with it the site map data hierarchy that is exposed by the control. 負數或正數的整數值識別層級向上或向下由站台對應階層從開始的節點數目和位移開始節點子樹狀結構的屬性公開資料來源控制項。The negative or positive integer value of the identifies the number of levels up or down the site map hierarchy from the starting node that is identified by the and properties to offset the starting node of the subtree that is exposed by data source control. 如果識別的開始節點是代表目前要求的頁面中，節點會被忽略。If the identified starting node is the node that represents the currently requested page, the is ignored. 如果屬性設定為負的數字-*n*，由資料來源控制項的樹狀子目錄的開始節點是上階節點*n*上識別階層的層級開始節點。If the property is set to a negative number -*n*, the starting node of the subtree that is exposed by the data source control is the ancestor node *n* hierarchical levels above the identified starting node. 如果值*n*大於在階層樹狀結構的樹狀子目錄的起始節點的祖系層級數目是站台對應階層的根節點。If the value *n* is greater than the number of ancestor levels in the hierarchical tree, the starting node of the subtree is the root node of the site map hierarchy. 如果屬性設定為正數 +*n*，公開的樹狀子目錄的開始節點是子節點*n*下所識別的起始節點層級。If the property is set to a positive number +*n*, the starting node of the subtree that is exposed is a child node *n* levels below the identified starting node. 因為階層中可能存在多個分支的子節點嘗試解析直接在識別的開始節點與代表目前要求的頁面上，如果可能的節點之間的路徑上的子節點。Because more than one branch of child nodes might exist in the hierarchy, the attempts to resolve a child node directly on the path between the identified starting node and the node that represents the currently requested page, if possible. 如果節點，表示目前要求的頁面不是識別開始節點的值的子樹中屬性會被忽略。If the node that represents the currently requested page is not in the subtree of the identified starting node, the value of the property is ignored. 表示目前要求的頁面節點是否小於*n*下識別開始節點目前要求的頁面節點層級做開始節點。If the node that represents the currently requested page is less than *n* levels below the identified starting node, the currently requested page node is used as the starting node. 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的效果和屬性。The following code example demonstrates the effect of the and properties. 此範例是由數個 ASP.NET 網頁、 主版頁面、 主版頁面區段和 Web.sitemap 檔案所組成。The example consists of several ASP.NET pages, a master page, master page section, and a Web.sitemap file. Web.sitemap 檔案定義站台的階層式結構。The Web.sitemap file defines the hierarchical structure of the site. 此程式碼範例，它會定義頁數，唯一的 Url，例如 1.aspx、 2.aspx、 A.aspx 和 B.aspx，所識別的如下所示：For this code example, it defines a number of pages identified by unique URLs, such as 1.aspx, 2.aspx, A.aspx, and B.aspx, as follows: Site.master 頁面包含和內控制控制項。The Site.master page contains the and a controls inside a control. 它會識別公開為 Default.aspx 中，階層的開始節點使用屬性。It identifies the starting node of the exposed hierarchy as Default.aspx, using the property. Site.master 檔會使用 Default.aspx 頁面。The Site.master file is used by the Default.aspx page only. 所有其他頁面，例如 1.aspx、 2.aspx、 A.aspx，依此類推，使用 Section.master 主版頁面。All other pages, such as 1.aspx, 2.aspx, A.aspx, and so on, use the Section.master master page. 此主版頁面為 Site.master，非常類似，不過它包含數個可以試驗的控制項。This master page is very similar to Site.master, however it contains several controls that you can experiment with. 一開始顯示網站導覽資料控制項繫結至`SiteMapDataSource1`，以指定為 1。The control that displays site map data is initially bound to `SiteMapDataSource1`, which specifies a of 1. 這表示會顯示目前要求的頁面的父節點。This indicates that the parent node of the currently requested page is displayed. 如果您檢視頁面 1.aspx 時，所顯示階層是 A、 1、 2。If you view page 1.aspx, the hierarchy displayed by the is A, 1, 2. 不過，如果您檢視頁面 4.aspx，階層是 B，3，4。However, if you view page 4.aspx, the hierarchy is B, 3, 4. 如果您變更如至`SiteMapDataSource2`、控制項會以不同的方式顯示網站地圖資料。If you change the for the to `SiteMapDataSource2`, the control displays site map data differently. 當您使用`SiteMapDataSource2`、屬性設定為`true`，這表示網站導覽資料會顯示相對於目前要求的頁面和屬性設定為-1，指出子節點的一個層級顯示，可能的話。When you use `SiteMapDataSource2`, the property is set to `true`, which means that the site map data is displayed relative to the currently requested page and the property is set to -1, indicating that one level of child nodes is displayed, when possible. 當您檢視 [A.aspx] 頁面上時，會顯示在階層是階層的目前層級，包括所有同層級，例如 B 和 c。當您檢視 1.aspx 時，不再顯示父節點。When you view the A.aspx page, the hierarchy that is displayed is the hierarchy of the current level, including all siblings, such as B and C. When you view 1.aspx, the parent nodes are no longer displayed. 下列程式碼範例示範您可以使用這個程式碼範例中的其他元件的 ASP.NET 網頁的其中一個。The following code example demonstrates one of the ASP.NET pages you can use with the other components of this code example. ``` <%@ Page MasterPageFile="~/Section.master" Title="Untitled Page" %>

1.aspx

 ```

summary.span: 取得或設定網站導覽中的節點，然後資料來源會使用該節點做為參考點，從階層式網站導覽擷取節點。

span.span: Gets or sets a node in the site map that the data source then uses as a reference point to retrieve nodes from a hierarchical site map.

value.span: 網站導覽中的節點 URL。

span.span: The URL of a node in the site map.

value.span: 會從網站導覽中擷取所識別的 及任何子節點。

span.span: The retrieves the identified and any child nodes from the site map.
The default is an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性繫結至網站導覽資料，並提供其站台對應階層中指定的開始節點為基礎的檢視。The property binds to site map data and presents its view based on a specified starting node in the site map hierarchy. 根據預設，開始的節點就是，在階層的根節點，但是您可以設定的開始節點至任何節點並屬性或 set屬性`true`。By default, the starting node is the root node of the hierarchy, but you can set the starting node to any node with the property or set the property to `true`. 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式設定屬性和繫結控制權傳輸至控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the property and bind a control to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_6#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_6/CS/webform2smdsnocustomcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_6#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_6/VB/webform2smdsnocustomvb.aspx#1)]
